message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still can't go above $9,000 for the product. I hope this meets in between our values.
